inputParameters.name: group
inputParameters.description: The planning group for which this trajectory was planned.

outputParameters.name: start_configuration
outputParameters.description: The start configuration of the trajectory.

outputParameters.name: configurations
outputParameters.description: The full configurations along the trajectory.

outputParameters.name: fraction
outputParameters.description: Indicates the fraction of requested trajectory that was calculated, e.g. 1 means the full trajectory was found.

outputParameters.name: time
outputParameters.description: The time which is needed to execute that trajectory at full speed.

outputParameters.name: planes
outputParameters.description: The planes of the robot's end-effector.
